body.name: TEYADI 320GB 2.5-inch Slim Portable External Hard Drive -USB 3.0 for PC, Mac, Laptop, PS4, Xbox, Xbox one-T208 Sky Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 18 hrs 9 mins
features: 2.5" HDD External Hard Drive supports Windows / Mac / Linux / Android. TEYADI external hard drive can be connected with multiple devices like PC, Laptop and MAC. It improves performance by transferring data at lightning speed. Our Portable hard disk's USB 2.0/3.0 version provides read and write speeds up to 10 Gbps .
The motherboard adopts noise-free solution, giving you a quiet working environment. Lightweight and portable size designed to fit in your pocket for easy portability.
This external drive is ready to use without external power supply or software installation needed. Ideal extra storage for your computer and game console.

What You Get - 1 X Portable Hard Drive, 1 X USB3.0 Cable, 1 X User Manual, 3 Years Manufacturer Warranty And Lifetime Technical Support. (If For Any Reason You Are Not Satisfied, Please Contact Us And We Promise To Make It Right For You.)

Tip: The file system selected when the hard disk is formatted at the factory may not be very compatible with the computer operating system, you can follow the steps in the picture to format it, and then you can use it normally.
body.description: Introducing TEYADI-T208 Portable Hard Drive USB 3.0 Ready, USB 2.0 Compatible No need to install software, plug and play, quickly and securely store large amounts of photos, movies, music and various data. Whether at home, in the office or on the road, USB 3.0 provides fast and easy storage and is compatible with the USB 2.0 interface Windows doesn’t show up in the file manager, you should Open Disk Management on Windows 8 or 10, right-click the start button and select “Disk Management”.On Windows 7, press Windows+R to open the Run dialog, type diskmgmt.msc into it, and press Enter

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Introducing TEYADI-T208 Portable Hard Drive USB 3.0 Ready, USB 2.0 Compatible No need to install software, plug and play, quickly and securely store large amounts of photos, movies, music and various data. Whether at home, in the office or on the road, USB 3.0 provides fast and easy storage and is compatible with the USB 2.0 interface Windows doesn’t show up in the file manager, you should Open Disk Management on Windows 8 or 10, right-click the start button and select “Disk Management”.On Windows 7, press Windows+R to open the Run dialog, type diskmgmt.msc into it, and press Enter Capacity May be Different Due to Use of a Different Measurement Standard 320GB≈298GB 500GB≈465GB 1TB≈931GB

Terabytes More Storage Stay ahead of the curve with the TEYADI Portable External Hard Drive, You have the flexibility to connect to old and new devices，Neatly organise and store all your files, without having to worry about running out of space. Compatibility USB 3.0 ultra-high-speed USB connection, can transfer data at 10Gbit/s speed,Plus， USB 3.0 & 2.0 compatibility allows for high speed data transfer with no external AC power cord needed. Simple Elegance Ultra Slim and Sturdy Metal Design: Merely 0.5 inch thick. All-Aluminum anti-scratch model delivers remarkable strength and durability, keeping this portable hard drive running cool and quiet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful little hard drive for backing up important docs and pictures
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this hard drive for my computer so I can save my documents and pictures to it, I've had such a horrible expirience in the past when my previous computer crashed on me all of a sudden and I didnt back any of my important documents or pictures up and ending up losing everything! I wanted to be proactive this time so I recently got a new computer and looked at several options for a hard drive and came across this one and so far I'm very happy with it! I plugged it into my computer as soon as I received it and was amazed with how easy it was to setup! It came with a USB cord so I plugged one end into the hard drive and the other end into my computer. I have windows 10 and went into my documents folder and it was already listed on there. All I had to do was right click on it to format it which took only a few seconds and then I was able to just click on the document folders I wanted to back up and drag them into the "Teyadi" external hard drive folder and that was all, my documents and pictures are now backed up! This was my first expirience buying and setting up an external hard drive and I was so very happy with how quick and easy it was to setup and would definately recommend to anyone looking for a good external hard drive for such a low price point. I put a ton of docs and pics in it and still have so much more room available on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No longer worry about slow PC due to full memory
reviews.reviewText: I made a good choice when I bought it, because I think all the files and pictures are important and I want to save EVERYTHING, that's why I always have a slow PC because of its internal memory max usage, but once I have this product, I don't have any more to worry about running out of space. Here I can save everything, super fast and very easy. It connects very easily and I can have everything in order. I believe that this product is essential to acquire, since in the same way it is important to have your files well stored, if you lose or damage your computer or laptop, you do not have to worry about your files.

reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Too slow. As always, it’s missing 5gb So it’s Not 500GB. I’ll will update review After I uploaded All my Comic Books from CDs & thumb drive to this 495Gb drive.!
